snippet.title: The Lost vs. Inferno (Agni): Shadow comparison
snippet.description:
The Lost was due to appear on consoles in 2002, but Irrational Games didn't manage to finish it. Indian studio FXLabs, which was working alongside Irrational, took it in its own hands and released a game called Agni (Inferno is a name for the export version, sporting some minor graphic changes).
This video compares the character Shadow from The Lost prototype and Inferno release (Russian version).

Thanks to Monokoma for pointing me at The Lost WIP videos.
